testcase.name: Gather Repository Information
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the SeleniumHQ repository page.........................passed When the user opens the Code dialog.........................................passed Then the repository clone URL is obtained from the input field..............passed And the number of releases is obtained......................................passed Then the gathered information is represented as JSON to file................passed

testcase.name: Retrieve Issues
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the SeleniumHQ repository page.........................passed When user open Issues tab...................................................passed And the user clears the search field and enters "sort:comments-desc"........passed And user press the Label filter.............................................passed And the user filters by the label "C-java"..................................passed And the user clicks the Open button.........................................passed Then the user retrieves "Title" and add it to JSON..........................passed Then the user retrieves "Title" and add it to JSON..........................passed Then the user retrieves "Title" and add it to JSON..........................passed Then the user retrieves "Title" and add it to JSON..........................passed Then the user retrieves "Title" and add it to JSON..........................passed
